word_mean: 〔复epididymides〕 〔NA〕附睾：沿睾丸后缘的细长束状结构，其曲细管道为精子的储存、转运和成熟之处，并延续为输精管

sentence.Network_en: Three anatomic parts of the epididymis are recognized.
sentence.Network_cn: 据认,附睾由三个解剖部分组成.

sentence.Network_en: Spermatozoa not only mature but also are stored in epididymis.
sentence.Network_cn: 现公认最为理想的男用避孕环节是干扰精子成熟以及附睾机能.

sentence.Network_en: The pathology revealed a leiomyoma with an intact testis and epididymis.
sentence.Network_cn: 病人术后恢复良好并于手术后三日出院.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 附睾(Epididymis)是连接睾丸和输精管的高度卷曲的管道。  附睾位于睾丸后外侧,分头、体、尾三部,外被有结缔组织和血管形成的外膜。上端膨大而钝圆称附睾头,由睾丸.
人体器官的名称_百度知道 ... 结膜 conjunctiva 精包 epididymis 精虫 sperm;spermatozoon.
...epidermolytic toxin 表皮溶解毒素，溶表皮毒素epididymis 附睾，副睾epifluorescence microscope 落射荧光显微镜

P34H , a member of the short chain dehydrogenase / reductase ( SDR ) superfamily , is acquired on the acrosomal cap of human spermatozoon during its maturation arising within epididymis .P34H是由人附睾上皮细胞分泌并定位于精子顶体的精子膜蛋白，属于短链脱氢酶还原酶（SDR)超家族成员。

list.abs: 根据胚胎发生学的分类总共有四种睾丸附件存在:①睾丸附件(莫干尼囊, Hydatid of Morgagni)、②附睾附件(Appendix epididymis)、③旁睾(Paradidymis)、④迷走的哈勒.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from Greek epididumis, from epi 'upon' + didumos 'testicle' (from duo 'two')

means.word_mean: 1. a convoluted tubule in each testis; carries sperm to vas deferens

auth_sentence.content: Causes and risk factors The bacteria that cause epididymo-orchitis may get to the testis and epididymis in different ways.

auth_sentence.content: Each testis has a long highly coiled tube attached to it known as an epididymis.
